welcomeToPath: Welcome to Your Path of Discovery
chooseService: Choose a service below to begin your journey into the mystical arts and unlock the wisdom within.
numerologyDesc: Uncover the secrets hidden in your name and birth date.
astrologyDesc: Explore your destiny written in the stars and planets.
tarotDesc: Draw a card and gain insight into your past, present, and future.
palmistryDesc: Read the lines on your hand to understand your character and future.
faceReadingDesc: Discover what your facial features reveal about your personality.
dream-analysisDesc: Decode symbols and find your lucky numbers.
personalGuidanceDesc: Get personalized remedies and guidance for your life challenges.
storeDesc: Authentic Rudraksha, Yantras, and Gemstones for your spiritual path.
uploadPalmPrompt: Upload a clear photo of your palm to receive an instant, AI-powered palmistry reading.
uploadInstruction: Click to upload or capture a photo
readingPlaceholder: Your palm reading summary will appear here.
paymentSuccessful: Payment Successful! Access your full report.
uploadFacePrompt: Upload a clear photo of your face to receive an instant, AI-powered face reading.
faceReadingPlaceholder: Your face reading summary will appear here.
enterDetailsPrompt: Enter your details below to generate your personalized {featureName} summary.
tarotPrompt: Select a card from the Major Arcana to reveal its mystical meaning for you.
otpPrompt: A 6-digit code has been sent to your phone.
paymentPrompt: For a one-time payment of {price}, gain full access to your detailed reading.
paymentSuccessMsg: Your full report is now unlocked.
runTheAppDesc: Proceed to the main user-facing application.
showTheConfigDesc: Access the admin panel to manage the application.
adminConfigDesc: Select a database table to view and manage its entries. Changes made here are now saved for your browser session.
guidancePrompt: Share your worries or questions to receive personalized Vedic remedies and spiritual guidance.
